values:
From this point onwards this journal is friends only. 

If you wish to become one of my friends please list your reasons below. There is nothing I detest more than someone who just adds you to their friends list without explanation!

I also only add friends that I feel are trustworthy and interesting. If I don't add you, please don't feel offended.. it may be that I simply need to get to know you more before I let you into my world.
